content: murano socks move the working yarn to the back turn the work and slip the wrapped stitch to right needle ◆ w&t ws with yarn in back slip the next stitch purlwise bring the working yarn to front and return socks by christine monnard © july 2012 slipped stitch to the left hand needle ◆ r round round ◆ r row murano socks is worked top-down with a short- ◆ rs right side row heel the lace pattern is inspired by a ◆ ws wrong side japanese stirch book the design is appropried for self-striping yarns the sock pictured was knit with «zwerger garn opal best of 4-fach «feine auslese»» cuff co 66 sts divide as you obtain a 11 multiple on each needle r1 knit r2-17 «ktbl 1 p1» repeat to end leg murano pattern 11 sts and 5 rounds r1-2 knit material r3 «ssk twice yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k2tog yarn zwerger garn opal best of 4-fach «feine twice» repeat 6 times per round auslese» 75% wool 25% nylon 425 m /465 y / r4-5 knit 100 g 1 skein needles dpns or circular 2 5 mm us 1 1/2 or repeat rounds 1-5 of the murano pattern 12 times size to match gauge or desired lenght notions stitch markers tapestry needle heel size short-row heel is knitted on 33 sts leave the women m you can adjust the size by knitting with instep stitches on a spare needle a lighter or heavier yarn r1 knit 11 sts turn gauge r2 purl 33 sts turn 34 st / 44 row = 10 cm / 4 over stockinette stitch r3 knit 32 sts w&t r4 purl 31 sts w&t abbreviations r5 knit to 1 st before last wrap w&t ◆ co cast on r6 purl to 1 st before last wrap w&t ◆ k knit ◆ ktbl knit to the back loop repeat r5 and 6 until you have 11 wrapped sts on ◆ p purl each side of the heel ending with row 6 ◆ st stitch ◆ yo yarn over r1 rs knit across the 11 unwrapped sts knit decrease ◆ ssk slip slip as you knit k2tog from back loop by the back loop the stitch and the wrap wrap the next stitch two wraps now ◆ k2 decrease knit 2 sts together r2 ws purl across 12 sts to first unworked ◆ w&t rs bring the working yarn to the front slip wrapped stich p decrease the wrap and stitch wrap next the next stitch knitwise from left to right needle stich and turn murano socks english v1 pages 1/2 r3 rs knit across to unworked double wrapped stitch knit wraps and stich throught the back loop wrap the next stitch and turn r4 ws purl across to unworked double wrapped stitch purl decrease wraps and stitch wrap the next stitch and turn repeat r3+r4 until all sts have been worked ending on r4 knit across heel sts foot if you want
